MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:53AM in the LL55 and LL57 postcode area of Caernarfon and Bangor following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:15PM on 31st January 2021
